device42.doql: select view_device_v1.device_pk, view_device_v1.name, view_device_v1.tags as device_tags, view_ipaddress_v1.ipaddress_pk, view_ipaddress_v1.ip_address, view_ipaddress_v1.tags as ipaddress_tags from view_device_v1 left join view_ipaddress_v1 on view_device_v1.device_pk = view_ipaddress_v1.device_fk union select view_device_v1.device_pk, view_device_v1.name, view_device_v1.tags as device_tags, view_ipaddress_v1.ipaddress_pk, view_ipaddress_v1.ip_address, view_ipaddress_v1.tags as ipaddress_tags from view_ipaddress_v1 left join view_device_v1 on view_device_v1.device_pk = view_ipaddress_v1.device_fk
